meanings.definition: The act or process of making something smaller in size.
meanings.sent1: The miniaturization of technology has made devices more portable.
meanings.sent2: The miniaturization of cameras has allowed for smaller, more discreet designs.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturization of the toy car made it look like a tiny replica of the real one.
meanings.sent4: In the world of miniaturization, small things hold great power.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturization of the model village made it a marvel of precision engineering.

meanings.definition: The state of being reduced in size.
meanings.sent1: The miniaturization of the furniture in the dollhouse made it look cozy.
meanings.sent2: The miniaturization of the phone resulted in a sleek and compact design.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturization of the cake made it perfect for a tiny celebration.
meanings.sent4: In the miniaturization of ideas, simplicity often reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturization of the tree in the garden created a charming miniature landscape.
